types_of_data_collected: Information you provide Gemini Apps (prompts, files, videos, screens, photos, page content, Live transcripts/recordings, feedback, Gem names/instructions, Saved Info)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (submitted or spoken prompts, shared content, interactions with Gemini Live, custom instructions, feedback)
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers) review some data for stated purposes
retention_period: Can be set to 3 months, 18 months (default), 36 months, or indefinite in Gemini Apps Activity. Manually deletable anytime. Chats reviewed by human reviewers (and related data) are retained for up to three years.

types_of_data_collected: Content that Gemini Apps generates (text, code, audio, images, video, public links, citations, chat summaries, personalized insights)
methods_of_collection: Generated by Gemini Apps based on user input and system processes
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers) review some data for stated purposes
retention_period: Can be set to 3 months, 18 months (default), 36 months, or indefinite in Gemini Apps Activity. Manually deletable anytime. Chats reviewed by human reviewers (and related data) are retained for up to three years.

types_of_data_collected: Info from connected apps/other Google services (Search/YouTube history, page context/URL from Chrome, relevant Google Assistant settings)
methods_of_collection: Collected from connected Google services and apps used with Gemini Apps
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
Relevant Google Assistant settings apply when Gemini gets help from Google Assistant for certain actions
third_party_disclosure: Connected Google apps save and use data per their policies and the Google Privacy Policy, including to provide and improve their services. Gemini saves and uses info from connected apps to provide and improve Gemini Apps.

types_of_data_collected: Info about apps, browsers, and devices (identifiers, browser type/settings, device type/settings, operating system)
methods_of_collection: Collected from apps, browsers, and devices used to access Gemini Apps
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers) review some data for stated purposes

types_of_data_collected: Interaction of apps, browsers, and devices with Gemini Apps (interaction logs, performance metrics, crash and debug information, data about interactions with public Gemini Apps content)
methods_of_collection: Collected as you use Gemini Apps
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers) review some data for stated purposes

types_of_data_collected: System permissions and device data from Gemini mobile apps (call/message logs, contacts, installed apps like Clock, language preferences, screen content, other app info like page context/URL from overlay, context info from connected devices/services)
methods_of_collection: Collected from mobile apps via system permissions and when using Gemini overlay or connected devices/services
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
Improve Gemini Apps experience, like contact suggestions (if Web & App Activity includes calling/texting history imported to Gemini Apps Activity)

methods_of_collection: Collected through supplemental Gemini Apps features you opt into
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services

types_of_data_collected: Location information (general area from device, IP address, Home or Work addresses in Google Account)
methods_of_collection: Collected from device, IP address, or Google Account addresses
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers) review some data for stated purposes
retention_period: not specified (Google Privacy Policy applies). Chats reviewed by human reviewers (and related data like location info) are retained for up to three years.

types_of_data_collected: Subscription information (if you have a paid subscription)
methods_of_collection: Collected based on having a paid subscription to Gemini
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services

methods_of_collection: Collected when Gemini Apps activate unintentionally (e.g., sound like 'Hey Google' or accidental touch)
data_usage: Improve Gemini models, other generative AI models that power Gemini Apps, and technologies that help reduce unintended activations

types_of_data_collected: Data shared when interacting with a user-generated Canvas app
data_usage: Viewed and saved by the app creator where they choose
Google provides storage for Canvas app data in Firebase
third_party_disclosure: App creator. Anyone with the public link can also view and edit data saved with the app.
retention_period: not specified (Retention depends on the app creator)

types_of_data_collected: Information about how often you use Gemini Apps
methods_of_collection: Collected as you use Gemini Apps
data_usage: Protect Google, our users, and the public
Extend to generative AI models and other machine-learning technologies powering services
retention_period: Kept until you delete your Google Account.

types_of_data_collected: Data necessary for legitimate business or legal purposes (security, fraud/abuse prevention, financial record-keeping)
data_usage: Necessary for legitimate business or legal purposes, such as security, fraud and abuse prevention, or financial record-keeping
retention_period: Retained for longer periods when necessary.
